name: A massive keratinous scale
data: It increases the users constitution magnificently.
It has average armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users hitpoints impressively.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'wall of steel'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
